name: Dargelos Mirror
description: The Dargelos Mirror is a statement piece with its ethereal inspired roots. The intertwinement of the twisted bronze-patina brass wires, against the circular cream shagreen frame of the mirror creates a truly whimsical feel, while retaining its elegance. The shagreen is hand-dyed by artisans creating a one of a kind piece each time. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KMR42.
